text: Patrick Ky was the Head of the European Aviation Safety Agency (EASA) from 1st of September 2013 to 31. August 2023. Patrick Ky studied at the École Polytechnique and the French Civil Aviation University (1989)Ils sont diplômés de l'ENAC and was previously Head of the SESAR (Single European Sky ATM Research ).L’EASA nomme Patrick Ky directeur général He succeed Patrick Goudou and has been replaced by Florian Guillermet. ==References== Category:Living people Category:1967 births Category:Alumni of the École nationale de l'aviation civile Category:French aviators Category:Alumni of the École Polytechnique
title: Patrick Ky
